divs: Sighting Detailstook dogs out looked up at moon and noticed star looking object below moon that was blinking several different colors. watched for about 5 minutes with no movement from its location. went in and got son and wife to verify. both saw object we watched for an additional five minutes and saw two planes fly in direction of object. went inside and checked again 10 minutes still in same location.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around July 18th 2013
Summary: blinking star like object stationary below moon
